name: Stage Door Delicatessen
address: 26 Vesey St 1st Floor, New York, NY 10007, USA

reviews.text: I can't imagine food tasting better than this. The entire staff is attentive to needs. Their food exceeded typical exceptional standards. The design elements appeal to those who notice such things. We anticipate many return visits.

I asked for all cheese to be placed on the side, they didn't do it. They didn't label the sandwiches. I requested the food to be delivered to my job at 11:30AM, The food arrived early and I was unable to pick it up from my work place lobby. Never again! I will order from Katz Deli or the Second Avenue Deli.
Very delicious bagel. Staff is amazing! A++++
Great experience and great food. Soooo many options on the menu. The bagel was great. Fresh strawberry cream cheese with real strawberries. And the apple strudel was huge and delicious!

Absolutely Loved Stage Door Delicatessen!

We were on a family trip, staying at a nearby hotel, and we ended up getting something from here every day. A couple of days we had breakfast, one night we had dinner, and at least one night we grabbed a late-night snack.

The prices were great, and the portions were even better. The bagels and sandwiches were excellent.

You could eat every meal here for two weeks and still not try everything on the menu.

The staff was always friendly, helpful, and in a great mood.

Next time we're in NYC, we'll definitely be stopping by again!
Wonderful spot! You'll notice the difference immediately. Personnel attend to needs, but can miss the mark. Everything shows professional standards. I want this place to succeed completely.
Highly recommend
Food was delicious, service was very friendly and welcoming. Amazing, hope to have time to go back

This deli is elite. Open 24 hours, and they‚Äôve got the whole operation down to a science. I pulled up late, expecting a wait, but they had my sandwich ready fast as heck. The menu is stacked‚Äîso many options that it almost feels impossible to pick just one.

I went with the corned beef pastrami loaded with coleslaw and Russian dressing, and wow, that combo hit hard. The bread was fresh, the meat was stacked just right, and that sauce pulled everything together. It was messy in the best way possible.

You can tell they‚Äôve been doing this for a while‚Äîeveryone behind the counter moves with purpose. It‚Äôs that perfect mix of chaos and efficiency that only a real New York deli can pull off.

Crushed it right before walking across the Brooklyn Bridge, and it hit the spot perfectly. If you‚Äôre ever in the area and need something quick, hearty, and legit good any time of day (or night), this is the move.
Un sitio muy recomendable para comer un buen trozo de pizza y continuar!

I stayed at the Four Seasons just around the corner and this deli was so close. Quintessential New York with pizza, bagels, pasties, oatmeal - all so good. Nice and friendly people working there. So good the first time that I had to go back a second time!
This place is a gem, with super kind staff and all the food you can imagine ü•∞
El costo un poco caro.
Warning: You get a lot of food!  The meat is real!  Love the atmosphere!
Typical NY deli, fast and good.

This place is an absolute gem in Manhattan! We loved it so much that we ended up eating here twice a day during our entire stay. The food is fantastic ‚Äî especially the ‚Äúhot food‚Äù section, which tastes just like home cooking. I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough!
Great staff, the reuben was excellent
Had come recommended for pastrami ‚Äî might need to come back and try sandwich, didn‚Äôt find it all that well served in the omelette I had.
I don‚Äôt go in there because the man at the register is overtly a creep. He checks out all women that go in and regularly make comments on their looks.

Fantastic. Kind of lost for words, was I just ready for food or was this place the best deli ever? My sandwich was great, stuffed full of meat and really tasty. Service was great, for NY super calm and helpful, exactly what I needed.

This place serves food that makes me want to tell everyone I know. Others accurately described what to expect. Their kitchen selects good products and serves generous amounts. Workers here handle special requests easily. I confidently recommend attention this thorough.

Rewelacyjne ≈õniadania.
Tosty, kawa, ciastka.
Przesympatyczna obs≈Çuga.
Wszystko sprawnie, szybko, smacznie.

Most things here are typical for a NY deli BUT THE BAKLAVA‚Ä¶ omg absolutely divine. So flakey and buttery and fresh tasting ingredients. Best I‚Äôve ever had. Cheese cake slices are not bad either, I liked the red velvet.
pastrami on rye was soooo good

The community needed a restaurant like this. Their customer handling was impressive. The dishes satisfy alongside attentive waitstaff. The location provides comfort and ease. I think everyone should try this place.

The food quality alone would bring me back again. The employees show exceptional warmth and remember my usual order. The restaurant maintains cleanliness and its owners show kindness, attention and integrity. The food satisfies and arrives quickly. I want to become a regular at Stage Door Delicatessen.
Oh my God, the sandwiches and do not sleep on the pastries either!
First time in a NYC deli and this place did not disappoint. Staff were very friendly and the food was great!

The food here delivers exactly what you hope for. The staff demonstrates kindness, warmth, hospitality, and proficiency. The food impresses along with the service and setting. Stage Door Delicatessen is perfectly excellent. This restaurant creates a memorable occasion.

I admit finding consistent quality here. The kitchen uses fresh food and presents it beautifully. Every dish satisfies and the servers are consistently helpful. Workers here provide pleasant service in a great family atmosphere. The restaurant excels in all categories.
Had breakfast here, food and service was good. Would be better if they had proper cutlery instead of plastic.
Great service,  great staff, and good food made fast. Huge huge selection of deli sandwiches.
EXACTLY what you expect of a traditional NYC diner. Really enjoyed the French toast with pastrami and eggs. Great crowd. Great music. Thank you.
Delicious bagels and pastries
One of the best delis!
Their prices are criminal. Used to just deal with it for convenience with work, but recently asked for a half pound turkey. 12 bucks. What?? Im over them.
I wish I had come back during my stay! The staff was patient and the atmosphere lively
C‚Äô√©tait tr√®s propre et d√©licieux. Tr√®s belle surprise. Je reviendrai
Food delicious but staff were great with a tourist not knowing how Deli's work - patient and friendly.
This food was so amazing that it helped shake our depressing morning at the 9/11 museum.  On our next trip to New York we will be making a point of going back.
The pizza was absolutely delicious! The crust was thin and not sauce heavy. Perfect! They also have homemade desserts like cannolis and baklava that looked really good.
We ate upstairs at the pizza restaurant and it was delicious. Quick service as well.

For me its the best Deli in NY. Love your pastrami and the Columbian Coffee, the flavoured Coffee, the Iced Coffee.
We came here every morning for breakfast and we loved it. Greetings to Ramon, Jose and John. M, R and F from Germany
Very cozy and relaxed atmosphere, reasonable prices, excellent service, and yummy food!! Highly recommend if you're staying in the Downtown area.

Tons of options to eat. I got the omelet and wife got the french toast. They were good, just enough food and freshly made. Im sure you can customize whatever you want. The doughnuts and bagels didn't look top of the line but im sure they are decent. Nice and staff. Whatever you chose im sure is good. There were like ten people or so in there (around noon) Plenty of sitting options.

I would have given them straight 5 stars. However they attempted to charge me an extra 50% for a sandwitch and a drink. As soon as I asked how much is the sandwitch the lady instantly rectified the price. Beware!

Ordered online for quick, convenient pickup. Everything was well packaged for transport and delicious when consumed. The lemonade is really out of this world, but everything was great. Our party had smoked salmon and cream cheese on an everything bagel, chopped cheese, and reuben. We'd do it all again.
Really good turkey, corned beef sando.

Muy lindo lugar, pedimos un s√°ndwich de pastrami y una tarta de ar√°ndanos. El s√°ndwich estaba muy rico, la tarta estaba con un sabor raro. Lindo lugar con ba√±os. Muy prolijo. La atenci√≥n r√°pida y cordial.

Food was great. We had the Cajun Chicken Wrap and the BEC on a bagel. Waffle fries were alright, although Chick FilA probably does them better.

Service was lightning fast, and the employees were very polite and helpful. Granted, this was in the late afternoon. I'm not sure how they are in the morning.

I'd definitely come back here again.
Í∑∏Îü∞ÎåÄÎ°ú ÏùåÏãùÏù¥ ÏûÖÎßõÏóê ÎßûÏïòÎã§

Amazing place! Very close to WTC and so quick! There were at least 15 people ordering with us and in 10 minutes everyone was already served! The options are endless and the energy is unmatched! I recommend this place to anyone looking for a great bite for a fair price!!!

Delicious fuss free breakfast place with plenty of variety of food for children and adults, and the friendliest cashiers!

I got an everything bagel with egg and cheese and it was a great breakfast to start off the day before exploring new york city.
Swing by and fill your bellies at this great breakfast spot!

really fast service and hot sandwich within minutes! Avocado is yummy and creamy and the rolls are just ok tbh and bagels too. Theyre $8+ sandwiches but you‚Äôre paying for 3 minutes out the door ready ding üõé ding on ur way!‚Ä¶

Stage Door w NYC to pizzeria, do kt√≥rej trafili≈õmy po intensywnym dniu zwiedzania, zachƒôceni obecno≈õciƒÖ licznych turyst√≥w ‚Äì liczyli≈õmy wiƒôc na dobrƒÖ nowojorskƒÖ pizzƒô, i pod tym wzglƒôdem siƒô nie zawiedli≈õmy. Pizza by≈Ça naprawdƒô smaczna, dok≈Çadnie taka, jakiej mo≈ºna by oczekiwaƒá w Nowym Jorku. Zam√≥wili≈õmy do niej napoje oraz kawƒô, jednak nasz pozytywny odbi√≥r zepsu≈Çy trzy kwestie: narzucony napiwek 18% 20% albo 22%, ‚Äûpomy≈Çka‚Äù przy wydawaniu reszty oraz problemy z toaletƒÖ. Dlatego choƒá sama pizza by≈Ça dobra, ca≈Ço≈õciowo miejsce nie zrobi≈Ço na nas a≈º tak dobrego wra≈ºenia, by szczeg√≥lnie je polecaƒá.

Being my first visit, I was indecisive in what to try - the staff were extremely friendly and I went for the pastrami sandwich. Beautifully succulent with warm melted cheese and rye bread. Great vibe and banter between the staff - makes a difference when the chefs are happy. Fortunate to have found this little deli!
A good place to eat if you're starving early in the morning. It's open 24 hours.
Great place to eat near the World Trade Center with delicious food and reasonable prices. Nico was especially kind to me‚Äîthank you!

Very welcoming service
I had Roast beef sandwich with lettuce tomato n cheese it came with a packet of crisp and pickle.
My son had a Pastrami sandwich also came with crisp and pickle
Drinks you order separately
There is seating available and restroom downstairs.
We both enjoyed our food, my son said his Pastrami was very tasty üòã

This place has been here for a very long time. The food is consistently delicious! For the area the prices really aren't bad at all. I have eaten here a bunch of times over the last decade and the sandwiches are some of the best I've ever had. The staff is always friendly and respectful. The coffee is pretty good too, I find it much better than some of the small coffee spots in the area.

Wanted to give a small update. Tried the pancakes today and easily one of the best I have ever had!  The consistency and quality of this place is so good!

Really nice staff. Good variety of options. I got Pancakes with Nutella and strawberries which came to ¬£13.09 which would be a similar price to uk for a more expensive breakfast. It did taste good and it was a fairly big portion. The apple juice was also nice and cold. You could have French toast instead of pancakes if you wanted to.
Delicious Reuben sandwich!! We stopped in for lunch and were met with friendly staff and fresh food made to order. Definitely a go to if we‚Äôre near One World Trade Center
Fijne zaak met een reuze keuze aan eten en drinken. Vlakbij wtc. De royaal belegde sandwiches die wij aten waren rijk belegd. Prettige sfeer met gemengd publiek, ook veel locals

Stopped in for some pizza and a brew. I also got the spinach roll. The food was good and the beer was cold so there were no complaints there. Then I went downstairs and treated myself to a canoli. The shell was crispy with a very good cream filling. All of the employees were very friendly and I received excellent service. Would definitely come again!

Excellent on s'est pris un sandwich au pastrami et un bagel pour 2 moiti√© de chaque chacun histoire de go√ªter les 2, et on a ador√©. Chaque sandwich √©tait servi dans une barquette avec des pickles et un petit paquet de chips on a beaucoup appr√©ci√© ainsi que l'accueil et l'ambiance

Ottimi i sandwich (sia panino con pastrami che il philly cheese steak), il servizio √® stato rapidissimo e le porzioni sono davvero abbondanti. Panini buoni e soddisfacenti. Il locale presenta una quindicina di tavoli per consumare sul posto.

When traveling I usually rely on reviews like here on Google to help me pick where to eat. I found this little gem in New York while visiting the World Trade Center memorial. The reviews were good so we had to try it out for ourselves. The pizzeria is at the top of the building so be ready to climbs some stairs, no elevator sorry. We decided to try some New York pizza. I would have to say this is one of the best pizzas I've had in New York by far.  There are lots to choose from it was hard for us to decide. Since my wife and I could not decide on one they allowed us to do a half-and-half option. My wife wanted the Hawaiian pizza which came with thick pieces of ham and lots of pineapple it was so good. My pizza came with lots of veggies and it was outstanding.  One more thing I had to try was the New York cheesecake. You definitely cannot leave without trying a piece of one of their freshly baked pastries. Everything looks so good and fresh I didn't know what to get. We sat down to eat but if you're on the go they do have fresh pizzas hot and ready for you to grab a slice. The staff was friendly and welcoming. The place was clean and accommodating. I like the fact that they have big windows so you can see the view.  I enjoyed it so much I had to introduce myself to the owner owner and tell him he was going to receive a 5 star rating from me. Make plans if you are in the area, you can't miss out on this place. Also the name says deli and on the bottom of the building is a fine deli which we did not get to try out but I hear is also very good. I guess we will have to leave that 1 for the next visit.

Tldr; decent price and convenient location, but food is mid and service is even more mid.

- no instructions for where to order. It was empty and we asked and they didn't answer us, but instead shooed us over to other workers who didn't speak English?
- eventually someone helped us, spoke English and took our order and payment
- the menu is chaotic, the colours and pictures make it hard to read
- only one pickle ):
- got the pastrami sandwich, their mustard was very sweet and didn't taste good. The sandwich was warm and soft. The pastrami tender but just okay
- the atmosphere is very sterile and kinda sucks, there was no one there and everything kinda hurt to look at
- probably won't ever go back nor would I recommend it unless you're starving and around

Exceptionally clean and comfortable seating area.  Quick service.  I got the pastrami on rye - reasonable portion size.  Mine came with two pickle halves and a bag of Utz chips.  I got a Dr Browns Cream Soda and a cup of ice.  The total bill (May 2024) was $18.50, which seems pretty reasonable considering the tourist area.  I would definitely come back.

Went to see the trade center and it was super rainy. We were gonna go to BK to get a chopped cheese but the weather said otherwise. Stopped at this place and ended getting a chopped cheese. Was pretty good! Fries were crispy and right too. They have a lot of options. Stop in if you're in the area. From what I saw, you can't go wrong. They serve beer there as well!

I‚Äôm not sure if this place is family owned, but it feels like it. You could tell that the guys who work behind the counter take pride in the restaurant. We went three days in a row for breakfast. Everything was amazing each time. On one trip we got toast instead of the fries that we ordered and that was resolved in minutes. You HAVE to try this place! The made to order items are customizable. If you want it, they probably have it.

Acudimos a este lugar para el lunch y cre√≥ que no elegimos bien. El personal de la vidriera no se vio muy amable ni tampoco servicial. Tuvimos que elegir algo muy r√°pido y no nos gust√≥. Pedimos la baguette italiana pero todo estuvo fr√≠o. Quiz√° fue nuestro error no pedirla caliente. El pastel de tampoco fue el mejor‚Ä¶ quiz√° tuvimos una mala experiencia y no siempre sea as√≠. El se√±or de la caja que hace el cobro es super amable. T√∫ puedes ir y ver c√≥mo te va. Saludos!

An iconic Deli in downtown NYC just steps away from One World Trade Center. I was nearby one morning and popped in for my go-to favorite: a bacon, egg, & cheese on and everything bagel, toasted and with ketchup. This bad boy was delicious.‚Ä¶

Had a roll with scrambled eggs, sausage and cheese - didn't care for the sausage they used, but the sandwich was good.  Service was really good. Was a bit worried because everyone says that you need to know what you want because they'll yell at you.  We found the staff very friendly and helpful in explaining what the process it.  Highly recommend, great stop before you head to one world trade or 9/11 memorial.

Stage Door Delicatessen offered us a nice respite after a day of walking around the city and visiting the Ground Zero Memorial. I was very hungry and the menu had so many choices as well as grab-n-go items in the refrigerator cases. The pastrami on rye sandwich was delicious and satisfying. There was plenty of seating in an air conditioned environment. The staff were very friendly and cheerful, it felt like a neighborhood place with wonderful people taking care of visitors.

Perfect location, great food, great service.
Superb choice of foods.

Food was good. The bun on the chicken sandwich was a bit dry but the rest was good. The Ruben and the pastrami were warm and juicy. The cook did not understand much English but the main guy was really nice.  We also had pizza, it was
pretty good but came up to almost $12 for 2 slices. Not much of an atmosphere as it is a simple deli so that's why I rated a 3.

Huge selection, good food, reasonable prices,, nice folks behind the counter. Cheeky warning signs posted to anyone who dares try and graffiti the bathroom. (It was pristine.)  Only note is that each of the paninis comes on pita bread - that was a surprise to me.  Other sandwiches have bread options.
Owner was wonderful. He made us feel very welcomed like family. The food was all delicious and the portions were huge at great prices.
